select count(*) from order_management
and order_mt_date >= #{startDate} and order_mt_date < #{endDate}
and order_mt_category1 like concat('%', #{searchKeyword1}, '%')
and order_mt_category2 like concat('%', #{searchKeyword2}, '%')
and order_mt_product like concat('%', #{searchKeyword3}, '%')

select count(*) from order_cm
and order_date >= #{startDate} and order_date < #{endDate}
and order_type like concat('%', #{searchKeyword1}, '%')
and order_store_name like concat('%', #{searchKeyword2}, '%')
and order_address1 like concat('%', #{searchKeyword3}, '%')

select.if:
select sum(order_price) as order_price,
date_format(order_date, '%m월-%d일') as order_date from order_cm group by date_format(order_date, '%m-%d') order by order_date asc
date_format(order_date, '%U째 주') as order_date from order_cm group by order_date order by order_date asc
date_format(order_date, '%m월') as order_date from order_cm group by date_format(order_date, '%Y-%m') order by order_date asc
date_format(order_date, '%Y년') as order_date from order_cm group by date_format(order_date, '%Y') order by order_date asc

select sum(a.order_mt_price) as order_mt_price, sum(a.order_mt_count) as order_mt_count, sum(b.product_business_profits)*order_mt_count as product_business_profits , sum(b.product_net_profit)*order_mt_count as product_net_profit, date_format(a.order_mt_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as order_mt_date from order_management as a join product as b on a.product_code = b.product_code
where order_mt_date >= #{startDate} and order_mt_date < #{endDate} group by date_format(a.order_mt_date, '%Y-%m-%d') order by a.order_mt_date asc

date_format(a.order_mt_date, '%m월-%d일') as order_mt_date from order_management as a join product as b on a.product_code = b.product_code group by date_format(a.order_mt_date, '%m-%d') order by a.order_mt_date asc
